description: Provisions a virtual interface VIF on a direct connect gateway.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

ConnectionId.description: The ID of the direct connect connection.

VirtualInterfaceName.description: The name of the virtual interface assigned by the customer network. The name has a maximum of 100 characters. The following are valid characters: a-z, 0-9 and a hyphen (-).

Asn.description: The autonomous system (AS) number for Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) configuration. The valid values are 1-2147483647

Mtu.description: The maximum transmission unit (MTU), in bytes. The supported values are 1500 and 9001. The default value is 1500.

AuthKey.description: The authentication key for BGP configuration. This string has a minimum length of 6 characters and and a maximun lenth of 80 characters.

AmazonAddress.description: The IP address assigned to the Amazon interface.

CustomerAddress.description: The IP address assigned to the customer interface.

AddressFamily.description: The address family for the BGP peer.

DirectConnectGatewayId.description: The ID of the Direct Connect gateway.

EnableSiteLink.description: Indicates whether to enable or disable SiteLink.

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

VirtualInterfaceId.description: Identifier of the Transit Virtual Interface

VirtualInterfaceState.description: The state of the virtual interface.

OwnerAccount.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the Direct Connect gateway.

Arn.description: The ARN of the Transit Virtual Interface.
